rukus.text: 7|73|hananim-i samudeu baegseong-ege geudeul-ui hyeongje salleleul bonaeni geuga ileudeola baegseong-iyeo hananim-eul gyeongbaehala geu bun oeeneun sin-i eobsnola ije neohui junim-eulobuteo neohuiegeyejung-i ileuleossgeoneul igeos-i hananim-i neohuiege yejung-eulo bonaen amnag tala geulihani hananim-ui daeji wi eseo pul-eul tteuddolog noh-adudoe haechi ji malla geuleohji anihamyeon neohuiga gotongseuleoun beol-eul bad-eulila

7|74|ileudoe adeuui baegseong-eul myeolhan hu neohuiga ileul gyeseungtolog hago neohuiga geu daejiwieseo geohadolog ha yeoss-euni neohuineun pyeong-won-e gungjeon-eul se ugo san-e jib-eul jieoss-eumae neohuineun hananim-eulobuteo bad-eun eunhyeleul sang-gihago daejiwieseo saagham-eul haenghajimalla

7|75|ittae salle baegseong-gaunde geoman han jogjangdeul-eun eog-ab bad-eun ideul-ege sillo sallega junim-i bonaen yeeonja inga lago mul-euni geuga jukkeseo bonaeon geos-eulo midseubnida lago dae dabhayeoss-euna
7|76|geomanhan jadeul-eun ulineun dangsin deul-i midneun geos-eul bulsinham-ila malha deola
7|77|geulihayeo geudeul-eun amkeos-ui nag taleul salhaehago junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul geo yeoghamyeo salleyeo dangsin-i yeeonjalamyeon-uliege yagsoghan beol-eul boila mal hadeola
7|78|geulihamae ttang-i jindonghayeo geu deul-eul deopchini geudeul-eun geudeul-ui jib-e seo myeolmanghayeo eopdeulyeo issdeola
7|79|geulihamae ttang-i jindonghayeo geu deul-eul deopchini geudeul-eun geudeul-ui jib-e seo myeolmanghayeo eopdeulyeo issdeola
7|80|hananim-eun ttohan los-eul bonaeni geuga geuui baegseong-ege ileudeola neo hui ijeon eotteon salamdo jeojileuji anihan bukkeuleoun il-eul neohuideul-eun jeo jileundan mal-inyo
7|81|neohuineun yeoseong-eul madahago nam seong-ege seong-yog-eul pum-euni sillo neohui neun joejieun baegseongdeul-ila
7|82|ittae geuui baegseong-eun geudeul-eul go-eul-eseo chubanghala sillo ideul-eun sunsuhan ja doelyeo wonhaneun jadeul-ila
7|83|geuleona hananim-eun geuwa geuui anaeleul je-oehan geuui gajog-eul guha yeoss-eumyeo geunyeoneun geuui baegseong-gwa hamkke nam-aiss-eossdeola
7|84|geuligo geudeul wie yuhwang bileul naelige haess-euni joejieun jadeul-ui mal loga eotteo haessdeonyo
